resources.string: Press Start and put your index finger on watch Home button.
Wear your watch tightly on and keep index finger on Home button.
Measurement failed. Keep your watch tightly on and index finger on Home button.
Permissions denied. Grant permissions in watch settings and start application again.
Body Sensors permission is required to make ECG Measurement.
Health Platform version is outdated or not installed.
ECG no supported on this device.
Could not connect to Health Services. Check error log.
